title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: Operating Systems Design Implementation of : resource scheduling problems, exercises on storage management, secondary storage, virtual memory, segmentation and paging. Concurrent processes, . Producer consumer problem, mutual exclusion and deadlock, critical section problem, semaphors, test and set, atomic operations, security and recovery.
